# attributedName

**Instance Property**

An attributed version of the data series name.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying var attributedName: NSAttributedString { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you set the value of this property, the system uses this value instead of [doc://com.apple.Accessibility/documentation/Accessibility/AXDataSeriesDescriptor/name].

## Naming the series

- **name**: The name of the data series.

items.description: The name of the data series.
items.name: name

title: attributedName
